last_episode_to_air.name: Their Solitary Way
last_episode_to_air.overview: The series concludes as Gibson and Anderson put fresh evidence to Spector, with explosive results. Spector's new-found friendship with another inmate develops, with devastating consequences.

name: The Fall
overview: When the Police Service of Northern Ireland are unable to close a case after 28 days, Detective Superintendent Stella Gibson of the Metropolitan Police Service is called in to review the case. Under her new leadership, the local detectives must track down and stop a serial killer who is terrorising the city of Belfast.

seasons.name: Series 2
seasons.overview: It’s been ten days since Spector told Stella that she would never catch him. As Stella tries to help Spector’s surviving victim remember her attacker, he is forced to confront the loose ends he left behind in Belfast.

episodes.name: Dark Descent
episodes.overview: When a murder in Belfast remains unsolved after 28 days, DSI Stella Gibson is called in to review the case.

episodes.name: Darkness Visible
episodes.overview: DSI Stella Gibson's worst fears are realised as Spector's murder spree in Belfast continues and she faces very real consequences after a reckless decision.

episodes.name: Insolence & Wine
episodes.overview: As DSI Stella Gibson takes control of the hunt for the serial killer striking women in Belfast, the realisation that his perfect kill is tainted pushes Spector into looking for his next victim.

episodes.name: My Adventurous Song
episodes.overview: When Eastwood's investigation into Olson's murder throws open some uncomfortable truths for Burns, Gibson comes under increased pressure in her hunt for Belfast's killer.

episodes.name: The Vast Abyss
episodes.overview: The killer's latest attack gives Gibson renewed impetus. As the net appears to be closing in, Spector makes a dramatic confession and a decision that binds his fate to Gibson.

episodes.name: Walk the Line
episodes.overview: Gibson continues her hunt for the killer.

episodes.name: One Named Peter
episodes.overview: Stella Gibson realises that her mistakes have put the life of Rose Stagg in danger.

episodes.name: It's Always Darkest
episodes.overview: After the breakthrough identifying the killer, Stella Gibson must play a waiting game.

episodes.name: Strangler
episodes.overview: A shocking revelation proves how terrifyingly manipulative Paul Spector can be.

episodes.name: The Fall
episodes.overview: As the investigation tightens around Paul Spector, he makes a bold break for cover.

episodes.name: In Summation
episodes.overview: With Paul Spector in custody, DSI Gibson searches for clues to help find Rose Stagg.

2.name: Series 2
2.overview: It’s been ten days since Spector told Stella that she would never catch him. As Stella tries to help Spector’s surviving victim remember her attacker, he is forced to confront the loose ends he left behind in Belfast.

episodes.name: Silence and Suffering
episodes.overview: Stella Gibson has finally arrested Paul Spector, but he has been shot by jealous husband James Tyler, leaving the staff at Belfast General Hospital battling to save his life. As the shooting hits the news, the powers-that-be question Gibson's handling of the case, while Spector's young partner-in-crime Katie plots to help him.

episodes.name: His Troubled Thoughts
episodes.overview: Gibson and Burns are hauled over the coals by the Police Ombudsman and the Policing Executive for their conduct and handling of the case. When Spector’s name is released to the press as the arrested suspect in the Belfast Strangler case, his wife and family are forced to deal with the consequences.

episodes.name: The Gates of Light
episodes.overview: Spector's legal team move into action, determined he won't stand trial.

episodes.name: The Hell Within Him
episodes.overview: Gibson comes face to face with the depths of Sally-Ann's desperation.

episodes.name: Wounds of Deadly Hate
episodes.overview: Spector's legal team are determined that he will never stand trial. Anderson and Ferrington make a discovery from the past that may help Gibson build her case.

episodes.name: Their Solitary Way
episodes.overview: The series concludes as Gibson and Anderson put fresh evidence to Spector, with explosive results. Spector's new-found friendship with another inmate develops, with devastating consequences.
